Alright, got it working. The reason this doesn't work is because the KHBBS patch included is missing files. Either google and find it, or just download the patch portion in http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5565849/%5BPSP%5DNaruto_Shippuuden__Ultimate_Ninja_Heroes_3%5BUSA%5D%5BFIX%5D 

 After that the game should run fine as long as the patch is enabled. It's also worth noting that the additional requirement this torrent's readme says are not needed, such as disabling VSHMenu or using Debug Fake Region
